pageContext.claim: “Patrick Leahy -- oh, he's never had a drink in his life. Check it out. Look under ‘Patrick Leahy/drink.’”
pageContext.analysis: Trump without evidence accused Sen. Patrick Leahy (D-Vt.) of being an alcoholic. "Leahy, who is 78 and has served in the Senate since 1975, is known for a number of things on Capitol Hill — among them, his Batman movie cameos, his fondness for the Grateful Dead and his love of photography and scuba diving — but tippling is not one. Three longtime congressional aides of both parties consulted about Trump’s claims, a Democrat and two Republicans, all said that while Leahy is certainly not known as a teetotaler, he is also not known to drink to excess," The Post reported.
